title: Riot pls
body: I reported a bug that couldn't let me pick/ban champions because of that bug i ended up getting a 30 min ban pls undo the ban from my account so i can play because i don wanna sit through it since i dident really do anything wrong

replies.body: I'm not aware of any bugs with picking or banning in champion select.  If your screen wasn't responding or seemed out of sync, then it's likely that your network is experiencing some instability and leaving you behind.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I can't alter game stats, but hopefully those steps can help prevent further cases.  I hope that helps!
